publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1866.1 Miss Annabel Goldie: Fuel Crisisâ€”As an amendment to motion (S1M-1866) in the name of Mr Kenny MacAskill, leave out from "calls on" to end and insert "calls upon the Scottish Executive to make representations to the Chancellor of the Exchequer to reduce fuel tax by at least three pence per litre (13.6 pence per gallon) and to investigate a derogation of Vehicle Excise Duty for island registered private cars and the extension of such a derogation to designated remote communities in Scotland, identified on a postcode basis."
